title: Olympic MTB: XC Mountain Bike Race for 2021 Tokyo Olympics — who to watch
content:
At the Olympic Cross country event Monday, July 27th in Tokyo, there will be fireworks — that’s a guarantee. Both the men’s and women’s races have multiple riders that can hammer away with the gold. The Izu MTB course is more technical than Olympic courses of the past, and with rain in the forecast, this […]
